mod.name: QueenMod
mod.description: A deposed queen, set to conquer the spire and seize it as her own hive.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Rapid Jabs
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Rapid Jabs+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Recruit
cards.description:
Add a queenmod:Hornet to your draw pile.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Recruit+
cards.description:
Add a queenmod:Hornet to your draw pile.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.description: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: BumbleBee+

Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Drone+

Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hornet
cards.description: Deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Hornet+

Deal 9 damage.
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

Deal 12 damage.
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Worker Bee+
cards.description: Gain 8 queenmod:Nectar.

cards.name: Attack Order
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Add a Hornet to your draw pile.

cards.name: Attack Order+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Add a Hornet to your draw pile.

cards.name: Charge!
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Charge!+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 13 damage.
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Conscripts
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Draw a card.
When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

cards.name: Conscripts+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Draw a card.
When you add this to your deck, add two additional copies.

cards.name: Cross-guard
cards.description: Gain 3 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Cross-guard+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each Attack in your hand.

cards.name: Defend Order
cards.description:
Gain 6 block.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Defend Order+
cards.description:
Gain 10 block.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Fleche
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fleche+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
Exhaust two random skills in your draw pile.

cards.name: Flyby
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Flyby+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. Add this card to your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Gather Order
cards.description:
Inflict 2 queenmod:Pollinate.
Add a queenmod:Workerbee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Gather Order+
cards.description:
Inflict 2 queenmod:Pollinate.
Add a queenmod:Workerbee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Hex Guard
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Hex Guard+
cards.description:
Gain 18 Block.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Hold Position
cards.description:
Gain 7 block.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on yourself for the turn.

cards.name: Hold Position+
cards.description:
Gain 10 block.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on yourself for the turn.

cards.name: Honeycomb Smash
cards.description:
Deal 6 Damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Apply 2 more Weak.

cards.name: Honeycomb Smash+
cards.description:
Deal 10 Damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Apply 2 more Weak.

cards.name: Incubate
cards.description: Gain 5 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Incubate+
cards.description: Gain 7 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Mark
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 queenmod:Pollinate.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on the target for the turn.

cards.name: Mark+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 queenmod:Pollinate.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on the target for the turn.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Gain 5 block.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Add a queenmod:Riposte to your hand.

cards.name: Parry+
cards.description:
Gain 7 block.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Add a queenmod:Riposte+ to your hand.

cards.name: Pollen Shot
cards.description: Deal 5 damage and inflict 2 queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.

cards.name: Pollen Shot+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage and inflict 3 queenmod:Pollinate to all enemies.

cards.name: Populate Order
cards.description:
Add 2 Drones to your draw pile.
Gain 2 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Populate Order+
cards.description:
Add 2 Drones to your draw pile.
Gain 4 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Rally
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength this turn only.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Rally+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength this turn only.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Ravage
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to all enemies.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on all enemies this turn.

cards.name: Ravage+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to all enemies.
queenmod:Lock your queenmod:Swarm on all enemies this turn.

cards.name: Regroup
cards.description:
Gain 8 block.
Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Regroup+
cards.description:
Gain 11 block.
Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Split Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
queenmod:Lock half your queenmod:Swarm on yourself and half on the enemy this turn.

cards.name: Split Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
queenmod:Lock half your queenmod:Swarm on yourself and half on the enemy this turn.

cards.name: Ambush
cards.description: X random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

cards.name: Ambush+
cards.description: X+1 random cards in your draw pile cost 0 until played.

cards.name: Assimilate
cards.description:
Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
Gain 3 queenmod:Swarm for each.

cards.name: Assimilate+
cards.description:
Exhaust all queenmod:Hive cards in your hand.
Gain 4 queenmod:Swarm for each.

cards.name: Beekeeping
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

cards.name: Beekeeping+
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Add a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

cards.name: Birthing Cells
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a Drone to your draw pile.

cards.name: Birthing Cells+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a Drone to your draw pile.

cards.name: Build Order
cards.description:
Add 2 queenmod:Workerbees to your draw pile.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 queenmod:Nectar.

cards.name: Build Order+
cards.description:
Add 2 queenmod:Workerbees to your draw pile.
At the start of your turn, gain 2 queenmod:Nectar.

cards.name: Busy Bees
cards.description: When you add a card to your draw pile, add an extra copy.

cards.name: Busy Bees+
cards.description:
Innate.
When you add a card to your draw pile, add an extra copy.

cards.name: Chain strike
cards.description: If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Chain strike+
cards.description: If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, Deal 14 damage.

cards.name: Dignified Slap
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Gain 2 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Dignified Slap+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 3 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Drone Workers
cards.description: When you play a queenmod:Drone this turn, add a queenmod:Workerbee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Drone Workers+
cards.description: When you play a queenmod:Drone this turn, add a queenmod:Workerbee to your draw pile.

cards.name: Feast
cards.description: Apply 2 queenmod:Swarm to an enemy. Deal damage equal to your total queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Feast+
cards.description: Apply 4 queenmod:Swarm to an enemy. Deal damage equal to your total queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Feint
cards.description: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 1 Weak and draw a card

cards.name: Feint+
cards.description: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, Inflict 2 Weak and draw a card

cards.name: Flanking Manuevers
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 5 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flanking Manuevers+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 5 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description: Gain 4 block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fortify+
cards.description: Gain 5 block for each queenmod:Hive card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Full Retreat
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Full Retreat+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Garrison
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. Add this card into your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Garrison+
cards.description: Gain 11 Block. Add this card into your draw pile instead of your discard pile.

cards.name: Gathering Swarm
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Gathering Swarm+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Gnat Squadron
cards.description: Deal 1 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Gnat Squadron+
cards.description: Deal 1 damage 7 times.

cards.name: Hive Autodefenses
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
queenmod:Honey-boost: At the start of your turn, if this is in your draw pile, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Hive Autodefenses+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
queenmod:Honey-boost: At the start of your turn, if this is in your draw pile, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Hive Network
cards.description: Draw 2 cards, For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

cards.name: Hive Network+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards, For each queenmod:Hive card drawn, gain [E] .

cards.name: Honey Blaster
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 times.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Honey Blaster+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage 2 times.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Honey Trap
cards.description:
All enemies lose 4 Strength this turn.
queenmod:Honey-boost: They lose 2 more.

cards.name: Honey Trap+
cards.description:
All enemies lose 6 Strength this turn.
queenmod:Honey-boost: They lose 2 more.

cards.name: Honor Guards
cards.description:
Innate.
Add 2 Bumblebees to your hand.
Retain. Exhaust.

cards.name: Honor Guards+
cards.description:
Innate.
Add 2 Upgraded Bumblebees to your hand.
Retain. Exhaust.

cards.name: Infest
cards.description:
Apply 4 queenmod:Swarm to all enemies and yourself.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Apply 2 more.

cards.name: Infest+
cards.description:
Apply 5 queenmod:Swarm to all enemies and yourself.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Apply 3 more.

cards.name: Inspiring Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Upgrade a random card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Inspiring Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Upgrade 2 random cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Killer Queen
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
If you have more Attacks than Skills in your combat deck, this costs 1 [E] .

cards.name: Killer Queen+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
If you have more Attacks than Skills in your combat deck, this costs 1 [E] .

cards.name: Lunge
cards.description: If the last card you played was a skill, deal 4 damage and draw a card.

cards.name: Lunge+
cards.description: If the last card you played was a skill, deal 6 damage and draw a card.

cards.name: Mating Dance
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, play a series of card types in sequence to gain 4 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Mating Dance+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, play a series of card types in sequence to gain 6 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Overwhelming Force
cards.description: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Overwhelming Force+
cards.description: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Perfect Landing
cards.description: If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain 7 block.

cards.name: Perfect Landing+
cards.description: If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, gain 10 block.

cards.name: Pheremone Swap
cards.description:
Retain.
Switch your queenmod:Hornets and queenmod:Bumblebees.
Switch your queenmod:Workerbees and queenmod:Drones.

cards.name: Pheremone Swap+
cards.description:
Retain.
Switch your queenmod:Hornets and queenmod:Bumblebees.
Switch your queenmod:Workerbees and queenmod:Drones.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Protect The Queen!
cards.description:
When you would take attack damage, Exhaust a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

cards.name: Protect The Queen!+
cards.description:
When you would take attack damage, Exhaust a queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile to gain its Block.
queenmod:Recruit 2 queenmod:Bumblebees.

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a queenmod:Hornet or queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile at random.

cards.name: Reinforcements+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a queenmod:Hornet or queenmod:Bumblebee from your draw pile at random.

cards.name: Royal Advisors
cards.description:
Innate.
Add a queenmod:Workerbee and a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Royal Advisors+
cards.description:
Innate.
Add a queenmod:Workerbee and a queenmod:Bumblebee to your hand.

cards.name: Scouting Party
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Draw a card.

cards.name: Scouting Party+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Draw a card.

cards.name: Sharper Stingers
cards.description:
Hornets do 5 more damage.
Add 2 Hornets to your draw pile.

cards.name: Sharper Stingers+
cards.description:
Hornets do 8 more damage.
Add 2 Hornets to your draw pile.

cards.name: Strategic Genius
cards.description: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Strategic Genius+
cards.description: When you draw a card this turn, gain 1 Strength this turn only.

cards.name: Swarming Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply queenmod:Swarm equal to the damage dealt.

cards.name: Swarming Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply queenmod:Swarm equal to the damage dealt.

cards.name: War Buzz
cards.description: Exhaust all Skills in your hand, replace them with Hornets.

cards.name: War Buzz+
cards.description: Exhaust all Skills in your hand, replace them with Hornets.

cards.name: War Trumpet
cards.description: When you play an Attack this turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: War Trumpet+
cards.description: When you play an Attack this turn, add a queenmod:Drone to your Draw Pile.

cards.name: Warrior Drones
cards.description:
Add 2 Drones to your draw pile.
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy when you play a Drone.

cards.name: Warrior Drones+
cards.description:
Add 2 Drones to your draw pile.
Deal 6 damage to a random enemy when you play a Drone.

cards.name: Art of War
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Reduce the cost of all attacks in your hand by 1 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Art of War+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Reduce the cost of all attacks in your hand by 1 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Forced March
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your deck, then draw a card.

cards.name: Forced March+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your deck, then draw a card.

cards.name: Hive Officers
cards.description:
Add one of each queenmod:Hive card to your draw pile.
Upgrade all queenmod:Hive cards in your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hive Officers+
cards.description:
Add one of each queenmod:Hive card to your draw pile.
Upgrade all queenmod:Hive cards in your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Honey Shield
cards.description: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain 1 Block.

cards.name: Honey Shield+
cards.description: When you gain queenmod:Nectar, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Hornet Swarm
cards.description:
All Hornets in your hand and draw pile attack random targets.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hornet Swarm+
cards.description: All Hornets in your hand and draw pile attack random targets.

cards.name: I Am The Swarm
cards.description: Exhaust your draw pile, and gain 1 queenmod:Swarm for each card exhausted.

cards.name: I Am The Swarm+
cards.description: Exhaust your draw pile, and gain 2 queenmod:Swarm for each card exhausted.

cards.name: Killer Bee
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
While in your draw pile, increase this card's damage by 8 at the start of your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Killer Bee+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
While in your draw pile, increase this card's damage by 8 at the start of your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knighting
cards.description:
Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knighting+
cards.description:
Add a queenmod:Hive card in your hand to your deck permanently.
Gain 5 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Royal Banquet
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Add a random queenmod:Hive card to your hand.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Add one more.

cards.name: Royal Banquet+
cards.description:
Gain 18 Block.
Add a random queenmod:Hive card to your hand.
queenmod:Honey-boost: Add one more.

cards.name: Royal Orders
cards.description: Play one of each queenmod:Hive card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Royal Orders+
cards.description: Play one of each queenmod:Hive card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Secret Weapon
cards.description: queenmod:Honey-boost: Deal 30 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Secret Weapon+
cards.description: queenmod:Honey-boost: Deal 40 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics
cards.description: When you play a card this turn, gain 1 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics+
cards.description: When you play a card this turn, gain 2 queenmod:Swarm.

cards.name: Torture Dance
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, play a series of card types in sequence to Deal 10 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Torture Dance+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your hand, play a series of card types in sequence to Deal 14 damage to all enemies.

relics.name: Queen's Banner
relics.description: The first event of every act is a Hive Event.
relics.flavorText: As long as the banner remains, the nation will never die.

relics.name: Draft Notice
relics.description: At the start of combat, add 3 Drones to your draw pile. (Drones are 0-cost skills that draw 2 cards and exhaust.)
relics.flavorText: One of the perks of eusocial societies: no draft dodgers.

relics.name: Honey Jar
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Nectar.
relics.flavorText: A hereto unknown technology allowing the long term storage of nectar. Remarkable.

relics.name: Bloated Manual
relics.description: At the start of the turn, draw a card for every 20 cards in your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: I assure you, every bit of information is essential.

relics.name: Medal of Honor
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Hornets and Bumblebees in your hand cost 0.
relics.flavorText: Some troops will distinguish themselves on the battlefield, and fight not for money, but for their nation and their pride.

keywords.name: Queenmod:aggressive
keywords.description: Activated if your current deck contains more Attacks than Skills.

keywords.name: Queenmod:bumblebee
keywords.description: Bumblebees are 1-cost skills that gain 10 block.

keywords.name: Queenmod:commander
keywords.description: A commander is a Hive card that upgrades all Hive cards of the same type in your draw pile.

keywords.name: Queenmod:dance
keywords.description: While this is in your hand, it will list a series of card types. Play them in sequence to reap the rewards!

keywords.name: Queenmod:drone
keywords.description: Drones are 0-cost skills that draw 2 cards and exhaust.

keywords.name: Queenmod:drone+
keywords.description: A Drone+ is a 0-cost skill that draw 2 cards and Exhausts.

keywords.name: Queenmod:finisher
keywords.description: Playing a finisher ends your turn immediately.

keywords.name: Queenmod:flight
keywords.description: Take 50% less damage. On receiving attack damage, lose 1 Flight.

keywords.name: Queenmod:hive
keywords.description: Hive cards are Hornets, Bumblebees, Workerbees and Drones.

keywords.name: Queenmod:honey-boost
keywords.description: Activates once for every 10 Nectar you have.

keywords.name: Queenmod:hornet
keywords.description: Hornets are 1-cost attacks that deal 11 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:lock
keywords.description: Your swarm will not move from the target during this turn.

keywords.name: Queenmod:nectar
keywords.description: For every 10 Nectar, you gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn, also activate Honey-boost effects on cards once each for every 10 Nectar when played.

keywords.name: Queenmod:pollinate
keywords.description: When a Pollinated enemy is attacked, gain 1 Nectar. Gain 1 [E] for every 10 Nectar at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Queenmod:production
keywords.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Nectar for each Production.

keywords.name: Queenmod:recruit
keywords.description: Transform a Drone in your hand or draw pile into the chosen hive card. Hand is checked before draw pile.

keywords.name: Queenmod:riposte
keywords.description: A Riposte is a 1-cost Attack that deals 9 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:riposte+
keywords.description: A Riposte+ is a 1-cost Attack that deals 11 damage.

keywords.name: Queenmod:swarm
keywords.description: Swarm grants you block and damages enemies. It attacks enemies you target, and returns to you when you block.

keywords.name: Queenmod:workerbee
keywords.description: Worker Bees are 0-cost skills that gain 5 Nectar. At the start of your turn, gain [E] for every 10 Nectar.
